# [Interview #874: Twitter 2013 (WoT), Entry #60](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=874#60)

#### [Christopher Thaeler (23 January 2013)](https://twitter.com/VagrantMuse/status/294190836734885888)

Are Elayne's twins intended to be Heroes of the Horn?

#### [Brandon Sanderson (23 January 2013)](http://twitter.com/BrandSanderson/status/294205331150622721)

It could happen.
